org.activebpel.rt.timersvc
Class AeTimerService

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.timersvc.AeTimerService
public class AeTimerService
extends java.lang.Object

A Simple Timer service. This class uses a standard Java java.util.Timer object to manage timer events.

Nested Class Summary
 class AeTimerService.AeTimerTask
          Inner class to provide specialized timer task functionality.

          This is the singleton instance of the timer service.

          The java timer used by this manager.
private  java.util.HashMap mTimerTasks
          The map of currently running alarm manager tasks, keyed by request ID.

          Constructs a new timer service.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static AeTimerService getInstance()
Get the singleton instance of the timer service.

schedule

public commonj.timers.Timer schedule(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                     java.util.Date aDeadline)
Schedule and record a timing request. Deadline version.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aDeadline - The instant at which the client wants the event to fire.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

schedule

public commonj.timers.Timer schedule(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                     long aDelay)
Schedule and record a timing request. Duration version. Granularity is 1 millisecond.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aDelay - The number of milliseconds to wait.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

schedule

public commonj.timers.Timer schedule(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                     long aDelay,
                                     long aPeriod)
Schedule and record a repeating timing request.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aDelay - The time to wait before executing task in milliseconds.
aPeriod - The interval at which this task recurs in milliseconds.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

schedule

public commonj.timers.Timer schedule(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                     java.util.Date aFirstTime,
                                     long aPeriod)
Schedule and record a repeating timing request.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aFirstTime - First time at which task is to be executed.
aPeriod - The interval at which this task recurs in miliseconds.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

scheduleAtFixedRate

public commonj.timers.Timer scheduleAtFixedRate(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                                java.util.Date aFirstTime,
                                                long aPeriod)
Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-rate execution, beginning after the specified delay. Subsequent executions take place at approximately regular intervals, separated by the specified period.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aFirstTime - First time at which task is to be executed.
aPeriod - The interval at which this task recurs in miliseconds.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

scheduleAtFixedRate

public commonj.timers.Timer scheduleAtFixedRate(commonj.timers.TimerListener aTimerListener,
                                                long aDelay,
                                                long aPeriod)
Schedules the specified task for repeated fixed-rate execution, beginning at the specified time. Subsequent executions take place at approximately regular intervals, separated by the specified period.

Parameters:
aTimerListener - The timer listener callback.
aDelay - The time to wait before executing task in miliseconds
aPeriod - The interval at which this task recurs in miliseconds.
Returns:
The Timer object created by the scheduling request.

cancel

public boolean cancel(commonj.timers.Timer aTimer)
Cancel a scheduled request given the timer object created from the scheduling request.

Parameters:
aTimer - the timer object, returned previously by schedule();
Returns:
True if request was cancelled, false otherwise
See Also:
Timer.cancel()

shutDown

public void shutDown()
Shut down the alarm manager. This will cancel all currently running notification requests.

startUp

public void startUp()
On startUp of the timer service, create a java timer.

getNextId

protected long getNextId()
Gets the next available id for a scheduled timer task.

getTimerTasks

protected java.util.HashMap getTimerTasks()
Returns the collection of timer events which are currently scheduled.
